info: We are proud to release Version 8.15.4, delivering crucial updates in security, major improvements in encryption, and an entirely revamped Fluxnode Dashboard.
bugs: UI Fixes and Adjustments: Various Purchase and Swap UI Treatments. Other UI improvements.
Monero Sending Fix: Fixed a bug related to monero cryptoasset sending.
UI Fixes and Adjustments: Various Fluxnodes App UI Treatments. Other UI improvements
Mobile GCM decryption incompatibility: Resolved an issue where mobile GCM decryption was incompatible with the latest version of the desktop.
Various Minor Bug Fixes: A range of minor bugs have been fixed to improve the overall user experience and ensure smoother operation of the wallet.
features: Backend Infrastructure: All Ethereum-family networks now use Zelcore-hosted v2 API endpoints, improving speed and reliability across Optimism, Sepolia and many others.

Blockchain Support: Added native node connectivity for Bittensor (TAO); balances are fetched directly over WebSocket (nodeService) instead of the Taostats API, and transaction history limit raised to 60.
Security & Stability: Electrum proxy hardening for Bitcore (BTX) and Raptoreum (RTM) now routes through 127.0.0.1 for better isolation.
Core-Node Upgrades: Shipped updated binaries â€“ Zcash 6.2.0, Horizen (zend) 5.0.6, Firo (zcoind) 0.14.1.41, Dash 22.1.2, Groestlcoin 29.0.0, DigiByte 8.22.2.
User Interface & Experience: Offramp (Sell) and Purchase (Buy) history screens completely rebuilt to match the new UI.
User Interface & Experience: Swap dialog now shows zero-balance assets by default, features null-safe search, and prioritises tokens with balances.
User Interface & Experience: Portfolio unsupported-coin warning now covers Sinovate and VeriBlock types.
Performance Tweaks: TAO auto-refresh disabled to respect node rate limits.
General Improvements: Across-the-board refinements have been made to sharpen feature performance and ensure a secure, seamless wallet experience.
